dimensions:
H x diam.: 20.6 x 8.2 cm (8 1/8 x 3 1/4 in.)
H x diam. (narrow bowl): 6.8 cm (2 11/16 in.)
title: Paro
description: Clear glass form composed of two thin-walled conical bowls, one short and wide, the other long and slightly angled; the bowls facing in opposite directions and joined side-to-side along their thickened vertexes to form a reversible goblet, the mouth of either bowl functioning as the base when upside down. Pair with 1986-36-2.
name: Goblet
